# About

Mini Shinobi is a platform game. The aim is to explore the world and find the missing 4 artifacts (Earth, Wind, Fire and Water). Once these are recovered the door to the final level will open and the boss can be challenged.

It's not very good and is still a work in progress.

This is my January entry for One Game a Month 2017. You can view all my games for 2017 here: https://www.sodaware.net/1gam-2017/

# Controls

Use the arrow keys move around. `S` for jump. `D` for attack. Push `Up` to go
through black doorways. Holding `Down` when jumping will drop you down through bridges and ledges.
